title: 589 11 "The Worst in the World! A Scientist of Terror - Caesar!"Transliteration: "Sekai Saiaku - Kyōfu no Kagakusha Shīzā" (Japanese:世界最悪 恐怖の科学者シーザー) Tetsuya Endō Hirohiko Kamisaka March 31, 2013(2013-03-31) October 16, 2022
transformers_text: 589 11 The Worst in the World A Scientist of Terror Caesar Transliteration Se kai Sai aku Ky fu no Kaga kush a Sh z Japanese Tetsuya End Hiro hi ko Kami saka March 31 2013 2013 03 31 October 16 2022 The G 5 marines discuss that Caesar Clown is probably behind the Island and that the child abduction case in that area could be true Caesar is dealing with a patient that he says needs to be healed but he sends him to the gas chambers Brown beard is tied up and tells Luffy and his crew that the Eleven Supernovas which Luffy Zoro and Law are a part of and Blackbeard are now referred to as the Worst Generation and that Caesar and Law saved him and his men from dying from the poisonous gas and was given the ability to walk again Smoker tells his men that Caesar was behind the failed experiment and not Vega punk Caesar kills his patient with poisonous gas and plans on being the best scientist the world has ever known to surpass Vega punk himself
